28.eng-name: Penalty of Hunting while on Pilgrimage

hadiths.text: Narrated Ibn `Abbas:A man was crushed to death by his she-camel and was brought to Allah's Messenger (ﷺ) who said, "Give him a bath and shroud him, but do not cover his head, and do not bring any perfume near to him, as he will be resurrected reciting Talbiya

chapter.ara-name: باب مَا يُنْهَى مِنَ الطِّيبِ لِلْمُحْرِمِ وَالْمُحْرِمَةِ
chapter.eng-name: What is forbidden for a Muhrim as regards perfumes
